org.apereo.cas.authentication.principal.cache

类 AbstractPrincipalAttributesRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apereo.cas.authentication.principal.cache.AbstractPrincipalAttributesRepository
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, org.apereo.cas.authentication.principal.PrincipalAttributesRepository
    直接已知子类:
    CachingPrincipalAttributesRepository, DefaultPrincipalAttributesRepository

    public abstract class AbstractPrincipalAttributesRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apereo.cas.authentication.principal.PrincipalAttributesRepository, java.io.Closeable
    Parent class for retrieval principals attributes, provides operations around caching, merging of attributes.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.2
    另请参阅:

    • 字段详细资料

      • expiration

        protected long expiration
        The expiration time.

      • timeUnit

        protected java.lang.String timeUnit
        Expiration time unit.

      • mergingStrategy

        protected AbstractPrincipalAttributesRepository.MergingStrategy mergingStrategy
        The merging strategy that deals with existing principal attributes and those that are retrieved from the source. By default, existing attributes are ignored and the source is always consulted.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setMergingStrategy

        public void setMergingStrategy(AbstractPrincipalAttributesRepository.MergingStrategy mergingStrategy)
        The merging strategy that deals with existing principal attributes and those that are retrieved from the source. By default, existing attributes are ignored and the source is always consulted.
        参数:
        mergingStrategy - the strategy to use for conflicts

      • getMergingStrategy

        public AbstractPrincipalAttributesRepository.MergingStrategy getMergingStrategy()

        参数:
        attributes - person attributes
        返回:
        principal attributes

      • retrievePersonAttributesToPrincipalAttributes

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> retrievePersonAttributesToPrincipalAttributes(java.lang.String id)
        Obtains attributes first from the repository by calling IPersonAttributeDao.getPerson(String).
        参数:
        id - the person id to locate in the attribute repository
        返回:
        the map of attributes
